name: fullstack-chatbot
description: Full-stack chatbot application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean-ports: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Ports cleared'
